text: Erika "Riki" Lindhome (born March 5, 1979) is an American actress, comedian, and musician. She is best known for roles in television shows including Garfunkel and Oates, Gilmore Girls, House, The Big Bang Theory, and United States of Tara. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American radio personalities Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania
title: Riki Lindhome
